trans-unit.source: Provides data for events that need a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> answer to a question.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos que precisam de um <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> responder a uma pergunta.

trans-unit.source: This class is currently used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDirtyStateNeeded> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada no momento com a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDirtyStateNeeded>eventos o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowDirtyStateNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CancelRowEdit>

trans-unit.source: It allows you to specify a response to events that occur when the control needs the answer to a question.
trans-unit.target: Ele permite que você especifique uma resposta a eventos que ocorrem quando o controle precisa a resposta a uma pergunta.

trans-unit.source: The answer to the question is specified by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A resposta à pergunta é especificada pela configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs"></xref> class using a default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*> property value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs"> </xref> usando um padrão de classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*>valor da propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified default value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs"> </xref> classe usando o valor padrão especificado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*>

trans-unit.source: The default value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QuestionEventArgs.Response*> property.
Gets or sets a value indicating the response to a question represented by the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a resposta a uma pergunta representada pelo evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for an affirmative response; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para obter uma resposta afirmativa; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
